prefs-banrepcultural-enable-banrepcultur: Label for the checkbox to force Legacy Banrepcultural operation accessible via Special:Preferences. When this checkbox is enabled, the December 2019 of Banrepcultural is used. When this checkbox is disabled, the actively developed version of Banrepcultural is used instead.
Detail explaining the operation of the prefs-banrepcultural-enable-banrepcultural-1-label checkbox.
banrepcultural-opt-out: Text of link that takes the user to the Special:Preferences page so they can opt-out of the latest version of Banrepcultural and go back to legacy Banrepcultural.
banrepcultural-opt-out-tooltip: Used as the tooltip for the Banrepcultural opt-out link
banrepcultural-action-toggle-sidebar: Accessibility label for the button that toggles the sidebar's visibility, as well as audible presentation for screen readers.
banrepcultural-action-addsection:
Used in the Banrepcultural skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=banrepcultural}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
banrepcultural-action-delete:
Used in the Banrepcultural skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=banrepcultural}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
banrepcultural-action-move:
Used in the Banrepcultural skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=banrepcultural}}

{{Identical|Move}}
banrepcultural-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in banrepcultural skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
banrepcultural-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in banrepcultural skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
banrepcultural-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in banrepcultural skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
banrepcultural-view-create:
Tab label in the Banrepcultural skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=banrepcultural}}
{{Identical|Create}}
banrepcultural-view-edit:
Tab label in the Banrepcultural skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=banrepcultural}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
banrepcultural-view-history:
Tab label in the Banrepcultural skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=banrepcultural}}
{{Identical|View history}}
banrepcultural-view-view:
Tab label in the Banrepcultural skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=banrepcultural}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
banrepcultural-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the Banrepcultural skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
banrepcultural-more-actions: Label in the Banrepcultural skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
